name: css-paged-media
description: Css module of single purpose classes for paged media

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-paged-media.css > css/css-paged-media.css && tachyons src/css-paged-media.css --minify > css/css-paged-media.min.css && tachyons src/css-paged-media.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
